plot: The Peaky Blinders are under attack. Tommy's power base in London is obliterated, and both Arthur and Michael are arrested and imprisoned.

All the Shelbys' London concerns are closed down with the Blinders arrested or on the run whilst Solomons frames Arthur for murder and Sabini ruthlessly takes back his club. Campbell reminds Thomas that he can use his family as leverage to make him go through with the assassination and arrests Michael for his part in the destruction of the Marquis of Lorne pub though Polly has sex with Campbell to get him released. Grace is back in London to see a fertility doctor and has sex with Thomas. Afterwards he visits May to whom he confesses that he still loves Grace. He then returns to Birmingham and tells Campbell where and how he will kill his victim.—don @ minifie-1
